mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stock_order_book (std_id, stock_id, order_type, quantity, price) VALUES (#{stdId}, #{stockId}, #{orderType, typeHandler=com.kb.common.typehandler.OrderTypeHandler}, #{quantity}, #{price})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM stock_order_book WHERE order_type = 'SELL' AND status = 'OPEN' ORDER BY created_at ASC
SELECT * FROM stock_order_book WHERE stock_id = #{stock_id} AND order_type = 'BUY' AND status = 'OPEN' AND price <= #{price} ORDER BY created_at ASC
